function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited focus on context in energy social research","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete understanding of the impact of contagious diseases in different social contexts","Mitigation":"Include contextual analysis in research, consider social factors influencing disease propagation","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Social researchers in energy","Owner":"Social researchers, research institutions, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consistent response by social researchers in addressing contagious diseases","Impact":"Difficulty in comparing and generalizing findings across studies in the future","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines for addressing contagious diseases in social research, promote consistent research practices","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Social researchers, research institutions, funding organizations","Owner":"Social researchers, research institutions, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Variability in backgrounds and levels of experience among scholars using social research approaches in energy","Impact":"Inconsistent application of research principles, potential for biases and errors in research","Mitigation":"Provide training and resources to support scholars with varying backgrounds and levels of experience, encourage collaboration and peer review","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Scholars using social research approaches in energy","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations, funding organizations"}]}
